data.title: 1G5.6. Excerpts and clips
data.text:
1G5.6. Excerpts and clips (Title and Statement of Responsibility Area - Statement of responsibility - Compilations, amateur footage of public events, home movies, trailers, etc.)

For and , use the of the work from which they are taken, i.e., treat them as incomplete parts of the original. See also 1F1.1.

245 00 $a [Wings--clips] / $c Paramount Famous Lasky Corporation ; director, William Wellman ; producer, Lucien Hubbard.

511 1# $a Clara Bow, Charles Rogers.

500 ## $a Production and cast information from catalog record for the feature, Wings.

Works which are known to have been deliberately excerpted and distributed as such should be treated as . For versions, see Chapter 2.

See also:

1G5. Compilations, amateur footage of public events, home movies, trailers, etc.

1G. Statement of responsibility
